提交信息: Merge branch 'tmux-3.6a'
Update CHANGES.
Do not read over buffer if format is a single #, and do not loop forever if UTF-8 is unfinished in a format. Reported by Giorgi Kobakhia im GitHub issue 4735.
Allow drag in alternate screen again, GitHub issue 4743 reported by Brad King.
Fix y offset of mouse if status at top. GitHub issue 4738 from Michael Grant.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Allow drag in alternate screen again, GitHub issue 4743 reported by Brad King.
Update CHANGES.
Add a missing skin tone, from Jake Stewart in GitHub issue 4736.
Allow characters to be combined in either order, reported by Jake Stewart in GitHub issue 4726.
Do not read over buffer if format is a single #, and do not loop forever if UTF-8 is unfinished in a format. Reported by Giorgi Kobakhia im GitHub issue 4735.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Fix y offset of mouse if status at top. GitHub issue 4738 from Michael Grant.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Add a missing skin tone, from Jake Stewart in GitHub issue 4736.
Allow characters to be combined in either order, reported by Jake Stewart in GitHub issue 4726.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Improve code readability in colour_palette_get and colour_palette_set. GitHub issue 4730 from Pavel Roskin.
Add check that the pane is not in alternate screen mode when in copy-mode. From Michael Grant in GitHub issue 4728.
Fix the size caluation for left-right windows used to spread out cells horizontally evenly. From Michael Grant in GitHub issue 4724.
Update CHANGES.
Change noattr to be an explicit attribute in the style so that it works correctly and does not delete attributes set in the style itself, GitHub issue 4713.
Add horizontal border case to server_client_check_mouse_in_pane to fix mouse resizing. GitHub issue 4720 from Michael Grant, reported by someone in GitHub issue 4715.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'

Add a get-clipboard option which when enabled (the default is off) uses the same mechanism as palette requests to request clipboard from the terminal and forward to the requesting pane. Remove the now-redundant forward-to-pane ability from "refresh-client -l". GitHub issue 4275.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Fix combine-test.result, GitHub issue 4717.
Fix combine-test.result, GitHub issue 4717.
Change noattr to be an explicit attribute in the style so that it works correctly and does not delete attributes set in the style itself, GitHub issue 4713.
Add horizontal border case to server_client_check_mouse_in_pane to fix mouse resizing. GitHub issue 4720 from Michael Grant, reported by someone in GitHub issue 4715.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Do not remove TERM etc for commands run from config file, reported by Dennis Eriksen.
session_index was never actually implemented, remove from man page.
Update CHANGES.
Place cursor on correct line if message-line is not 0, reported by Alexis Hildebrandt.
Newer libevents do not allow event_del on a zero'd event.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Newer libevents do not allow event_del on a zero'd event.
Version and CHANGES.
Place cursor on correct line if message-line is not 0, reported by Alexis Hildebrandt.
Need signal.h for utempter, from Yasuhiro Kimura.
Need signal.h for utempter, from Yasuhiro Kimura.
Update version.
Merge branch 'tmux-3.6'
Add to CHANGES.
Add seconds options for clock mode, from augustus7613 dot mail at pm dot me in GitHub issue 4697.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Add to CHANGES.
Merge branch 'master' into tmux-3.6
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Add seconds options for clock mode, from augustus7613 dot mail at pm dot me in GitHub issue 4697.
Update version and CHANGES.
Merge tag '3.5a'  tmux 3.5a.
Add a resize callback for menus so that they are correctly moved on resize. From m-einfalt at gmx dot de in GitHub issue 4696.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Make -v to source-file pass through to subsequent source-file commands, GitHub issue 4216.
Allow show-messages to work without a client.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Send matching terminator on queued requests, reported by Henry Qin.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'

When copying a line from one screen to another, stop only when both source and target are beyond the allocated line length. Fixes problems with trailing spaces on pane-border-format. GitHub issue 4688 from Dmitry Ryabkov.
Fix build afte merge, from Vladimir Lomov.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Make requests to the external terminal one queue instead of one by type, and include any other requests as well so that ordering is maintained.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
If display-popup is used inside a popup, modify that popup. From m-einfalt at gmx dot de in GitHub issue 4678.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Do not send theme updates to panes that have exited, GitHub issue 4671.
Convert all keys for backspace, not just A-Z.
Add a command to explcitly set the selection mode in copy mode, GitHub issue 3842.
Save and restore images in alternate screen, GitHub issue 3732.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
correct test for COLORTERM containing 256 found with smatch, ok nicm@
Do not try to allocate zero size colours, GitHub issue 4674.
consistently use tabs for indentation found with smatch, ok nicm@
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Ignore Hangul filler character. There doesn't seem to be much agreement on what to do with this but ignoring it seems rightand does improve things. GitHub issue 3998.
Handle regional indicators and emoji modifiers in a better way, GitHub issue 3998.
Handle ~ correctly when loading a file, GitHub issue 3518.
Fix now-incorrect text about {}s.
Preserve marked pane with swap-window and move-window, GitHub issue 3443.
Set and check COLORTERM as a hint for RGB colour.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'

If tmux receives a palette request (OSC 4) in a pane and the palette entry has not been set, send a request to the most recently used client and forward any response instead. Based on change from Tim Culverhouse in GitHub issue 4665.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Add -l flag to command-prompt to disable splitting into multiple prompts, GitHub issue 4483.
Don't enter copy mode on mouse wheel in alternate screen, GitHub issue 3705.
Cast to avoid warnings on 32-bit architectures. GitHub issue 4597.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Add commands to centre the cursor in copy mode, from m-einfalt at gmx dot de in GitHub issue 4662.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Support case insensitive search in modes in the same way as copy mode (like emacs, so all-lowercase means case insensitive). GitHub issue 4396.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Do not realpath() everything since it is pointless and breaks symlinks. GitHub issue 4427.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Do not try to reflow if line is NULL.
Tweak error messages so that file name isn't modified when we capitalize the first letter, from Pavel Roskin in GitHub issue 4666.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Do not play games with lines for view mode output since it stops them wrapping, GitHub issue 4462.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'

Fix the logic of the no-detached case for detach-on-destroy option - a previous change made it so that even in the no-detached case, tmux would always re-attach to a session, even if there weren't any detached ones. From Martin Louazel in GitHub issue 4649.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Add buffer_full format variable, from Mohammad AlSaleh in GitHub issue 4630.
Check allow-set-title for APC as well.
Implement getdtablecount(3) for Darwin, from Chip Davis in GitHub issue 4636.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Check the right flags member, reported by someone in GitHub issue 4634.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Remove some unnecessary assignments.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Check for vlock earlier to neaten output.
Don't try to change directory if it is NULL.
The client can be NULL, fixes -v in config file.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
correct indentation, no functional change found with smatch, ok nicm@
Add test for control mode, from Sergei Nizovtsev.
Change so that source-file errors are reported correctly in control mode, from Sergei Nizovtsev in GitHub issue 4626.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Quote cwd for glob in a way that actually works, from Pavel Roskin in GitHub issue 4623.

Introduce a new window option: tiled-layout-max-columns. It configures the maximum number of columns in the tiled layout. The default value is 0 which means no limit and makes the change backward-compatible. From vkadlcik at redhat dot com.
Do not force SIXEL images to a multiple of 6 lines. From nincsnevem662 at gmail dot com in GitHub issue 4622.

Fix OOB access in sixel_print by ensuring that the number of chunks actually matches the highest color used on the image, even if not defined as a color register. From nincsnevem662 at gmail dot com in GitHub issue 4621.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Restore default blinking state when restoring default cursor style, from Andrea Alberti.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Add support for DECRQSS SP q (report cursor style), DECRQM ?12 (report cursor blink state) and DECRQM ?2004, ?1004, ?1006 (report mouse state).  From Andrea Alberti in GitHub issue 4618.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Set PWD for jobs as well as panes.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Delete timer before adding it again.
Fix missing argument from OSC 4 reply, from someone in GitHub issue 4596.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Add -k flag to display-popup which allows any key to dismiss the popup once the command has exited. From Meriel Luna Mittelbach in GitHub issue 4612.
Increase the escape delay when waiting for an RGB response no matter when it is triggered (they can also be sent on resize). GitHub issue 4569.
Ensure break-pane -P prints when only one pane is left. From Chaoyi Yin in GitHub issue 4615.
Give another bit to the first component of SIXEL colours to fix the HLS color space which uses 360 degrees in its first component. From nincsnevem662 at gmail dot com in GitHub issue 4616.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Correctly calculate lines to clear for deletions, from Pavel Roskin.
input_stop_utf8 can move the cursor, so it is now wrong to store the cursor position before calling it. Problem found by Jayakrishna Vadayath.
Be more robust against misbehaving clients, prompted by deraadt based on a report from sai02 at student dot ubc dot ca.
Fix build.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
A couple of memory leaks from someone in GitHub issue 4590.
Extend pane lookup special case for switch-client to mouse target ("=") so that it works for panes on status line.
Do not leak label if it is too long, GitHub issue 4591.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Do not double free argv from MSG_COMMAND if it is too long, reported by sai02 at student dot ubc dot ca via deraadt. ok deraadt
Add a nicer default second and third status line, from Michael Grant in GitHub 4490.
Add some NULL checks, GitHub issue 4586.
Add pane-border-lines value to use spaces for pane borders, from lukas dot 23022005 at gmail dot com in GitHub issue 4587.
Do not leak opened file, from lg65438805 at gmail dot com in GitHub issue 4577.
Replace invalid UTF-8 with the placeholder instead of ignoring them (this is what most terminals do), GitHub issue 4514.
Fix PageDown in menus, from Pavel Roskin in GitHub issue 4581.
Free command on failure, GitHub issue 4578.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Do not leak buffer if not used, reported by someone in GitHub issue 4575.
Flush scrolling when wrapping so UTF-8 in last position draws correctly, GitHub issue 4518.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Do not leak on failure, GitHub 4565.
Add UTF-8 regress test.
Fix reverse documentation of display-popup -s and -S, from Ricardo Signes.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
The AIX functions hang on 7300-01-01-2246 according to GitHub issue 4400. Remove them.
Fix incorrect handling of Korean Hangul Jamo characters. GitHub issue 4546 from Roy Jung.
Send SIGCHLD after utempter_remove_record as well. GitHub issue 4559.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
yyerror should be void.
Only accept DA and DA2 when they end in 'c', stops them being confused with theme responses.. GitHub issue 4561.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Correctly remove overwritten wide characters at column 1.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Allow uppercase letters in gray/grey color names, GitHub issue 4560 from Pavel Roskin.
Update use-this-issue-template.md
Update use-this-issue-template.md
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Increase delay for foreground and background queries as well as device attributes, GitHub issue 4541.
Use MAC_OS_X_VERSION_MIN_REQUIRED. From Sevan Janiyan, GitHub issue 4550.
Use window index not ID for sorting, reported by naru at naruaway dot com in GitHub issue 4551.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Add sorting to W, P, L operators as well, and add some new session format variables. From Michael Grant in GitHub issue 4516.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'

Missed a header.
Update imsg from OpenBSD.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'

Detect support for OSC 52 using the device attributes report. Some terminals are using this to indicate that they support copying to the clipboard with XTerm's OSC 52 sequence. From James Holderness in GitHub issue 4539.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Add noattr and use in mode-style to allow whether attributes are ignored or used to be configured. GitHub issue 4498.
Add S: to list sessions with modifiers for sorting, from Michael Grant.
Merge branch 'obsd-master'
Expand mode-style with E: so # is correctly processed, GitHub issue 4533.
Do not replace SHELL when using /bin/sh. From someone in GitHub issue 4528.
